article_title: Israel may have tortured Palestinian prisoners - UN
sentence: The  war  in  Gaza  was  triggered  by  Hamas's  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October  last  year,  when  militants  from  the  group  killed  around  1,200  Israelis  and  took  251  more  hostage.

article_title: Israel may have tortured Palestinian prisoners - UN
sentence: Israel  retaliated  with  a  months-long  military  campaign  in  Gaza  that  has  killed  more  than  39,000  Palestinians,  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Israel may have tortured Palestinian prisoners - UN
sentence: At  least  53  people  are  believed  to  have  died  in  detention.
